content.detailedDescription: more witness can be found in the universtiy ofutah student apts about 100 people watched for 30 mins then it disapeared.People say it was a ballon but i am convinced other wisse
content.summary: 100s of people watched the ufo in the east bench o

content.detailedDescription: This is a report of my "silver sphere",seen on the afternoon of may 18th.2002.Itwas seen at 14:20 edt as i sat in my backyard for a rest.I was facingnortheast,when i saw a glint in the sky,to the northwest.Unfortunately,i had nothung my binoculars on my neck, as i usually do.Strangely,i would best describeit as a ball bearing, flying through the sky.Visibility was excellent and thesun was shining brightly,with a clear,blue sky.Its speed was tremendouslyfast.This proved to me,that it could not have been a balloon(or anything elseim familiar with). my observation lasted through 50 degrees,horizontally inonly 7 seconds,at most.I estimated that the craft would have travelled fromhorizon to horizon in less than 20 seconds.I also estimated that probably,abb,held at arms length,would cover it well.It flew on a straight course, with nostops,starts,zig-zags,or any other course changes.This sighting was my fourthand none of the other sightings were in any way similar to this one.
content.summary: 5/18/02 atlanta,ga. unidentified silver sphere sig

content.detailedDescription: Three disklike objects were observed over mountains near raton, new mexico bythe primary witness and approximately 20 other (unfortunately unidentified)witnesses nearby. these objects "changed position often, higher in sky thenlower, very fast speeds, sighting around 11:30 to 12:00 evening" according toprimary witness.  details on the sighting form were however left sketchy on somepoints, and witness is very difficult to reach by phone.
content.summary: Three disklike objects over mountains near raton, nm.
Strange lights in the sky, west virginia
3 military jets chasing a pulsating blue silent fl

content.detailedDescription: I was with my two older brothers in the woods in north spokane when one of usesaw the disk. it was travelling horizonatally above the treetops, heading towardthe hillside. i felt that it was completely familiar, probably because ofrepresentations i saw on tv. we all watched it as it rose vertically when it gotclose to the hillside. once it was above the level of the hilltop it resumedtravelling horizonatally and continued out of sight over the top of the hill. weall ran home to tell our dad. he got mad at us and told us it was just anairplane. we told him that no, it was a flying saucer. he became very angry andyelled at us that it was just a plane. so we never discussed it again.
content.summary: Saw one (1) silver saucer-shaped disk

content.detailedDescription: It definitely was technological in nature (i.E electric lights or something thatlooked like them).  a bright white light, and a dimmer red one to the side.  itseemed to be on a descending pathmaybe a 15 degree angle from the earths surface.  it was low on the horizon,perhaps it went right into lake ontario, or perhaps it was further south.  itwas moving very fast, and only appeared for about a quarter of a second, but ilooked right at it.
content.summary: Electrically lit, moving fast earthwards possible.

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way to a church sponsered seminary group in the early morning.  iwas driving in my car to pick up my friend, and in the sky i saw multiple purplelights.  they were there briefly and then left.  i was listening to the radio,and somebody called into the station and stated that they too had seen thestrange purple lights in the sky.  me and a guy in our car pool that i hadalready picked up, thought the incident very strange.
content.summary: Six or seven purple lights

content.detailedDescription: As we were walking we noticed an object in the sky moving rapidly but slightlyerratic .. we watched the object until it was no longer visible.  there were norunning lights noticed, just a glow to the object.  there was also no soundheard from the object.  we continued our walk about 1/4 mile and we noticed anobject again behaving in the same manner.  only this time there appeared to bebeams of light going towards the object and also from it.  then after a fewbeams of light were shot towards/from it ... it turned red and vanished.
content.summary: Ufo in the sky being shot at

content.detailedDescription: I saw what appeared to be a orange ball in the sky. it could have been a weatherballon, or planet because i think that the sun was reflecting off of it. it waslate in the evening while the sun was setting. due west from bann, germany. idid not pay any attention at first, but i herd that an meteor fell in southerngerman and thought that maybe that had something to do with it, but i doubt it.The object was stationary and did not move at all. it was visible for about 5minuets then a cloud came between us and when the cloud passed it was gone. fromthe ground i estimate the angle of observation at 15 to 20 degrees due west.Maybe someone else saw it but i think it was a satelite, weather ballon orsomething like that. all i know is that it was round, had a bright orange glow,and from where i was it was about the size of a m26m maybe a little smaller but about that size. it looked like someone hadshrunk the sun. it was not the sun because there was only like 5 clouds in thesky and they were small. i hope this helps
content.summary: Orange ball in sky
Unusual light formation/ i am aircraft recognition

content.detailedDescription: driving home from store to buycigarettes,i drove down my street which the moon was straight ahead of my carwith a perfect view of the moon at a low angle.There was a huge square blockdark spot on the left lower of the moon, approx. at the 8 oclock position.  ithen drove to get a different angle of view which was a mistake on my part,whichtook less than a half a minute,because the object was gone when i got back to myoriginal position. i deduce that this was something really huge blocking theview of the moon from its appearance.
content.summary: Shadow on the moon

content.detailedDescription: there isa book clear intent that details a ufosighting in the 70s at the exact same area.  having read this book, i wasastounded to see something really strange in the exact area last week whiletraveling thru on the 22 and 24 of july.  i know this is absurd but this areahas really clear skis and the missile sites are in clear view-  i could see whatappeared to be a hellicopter flying oddly travelling north on highway 191outside of harlowtown on the 22nd.  on the 24th travelling into harlowtown onhighway 12 (east) i saw the exact same thing at about the same time!
content.summary: Odd aeriel activites above misille site

content.detailedDescription: I was at home, preparing to go to bed. went outside and got in the hot tub.While looking at the sky, i noticed what appeared to be flashing ball of red,blue, and white lights. i went inside and found my binoculars and by steadyingthem on the edge of the hot tub, was able to focus on the object. it was diskshaped, tilted at approximately a 40 degree angle. could clearly make out thelights around the edge, but the center was dark. i thought that it may of beenthe planet mars, but it was visible, and further to the west of this object. icalled to my wife to come look, and she used the binoculars and her descriptionis the same as mine. we had our 13 year old son come look at it, he is thinkingit is a star with gas clouds around it. our 9 year old daughter was also awakeand she came and looked at it also. at the time im typing this it is still inthe sky, but is no longer tilted at a steep angle, and is relatively flat to thehorizon.
content.summary: Disk shaped object, red, blue, and white lights ar

content.detailedDescription: Awoke at 3:10 am to go to the bathroom and get a drink of water. heard a loudhumming - like a fan on its highest speed. saw a bright white light outside andwent out to look. saw a triangular pattern of lights (7?) apparently on theunderside of something large moving acroos the sky. lights went out, flickeredgreen, then flashed on green. then went off for 2 seconds, then flickered red,then went on red. i went in the house to wake my wife but she only heard thehumm - it had cleared the treeline by then. later in the morning (aroundnoontime) i observed a single black helicopter cruising around, then two moreflying in formation. dont know if its related or not
content.summary: Triangular shaped collection of lights
Superstructure made up of red rotating beacons.

content.detailedDescription: i was sitting in my concervetry about 7pm on thenight clear sky but comming over later was some cloud.Looking out of the windowi saw a dot as i thought on the window.I got up and went to scratch it of andnoticed it was outside in the sky.Fetched my binocs and went down the gardentohave a good look,and i saw a large triangle upside down.The sun was setting,onthe sun side it was glowing bright silver on the other side it was black shadedfrom the sun and turning slowly from right to left.After about 15 minutes thecloud came over the object waited till the cloud had gone,and the object hadgone also.
content.summary: Large cone turning gently from right to left.
Object chased by fighter jets

content.detailedDescription: Babylon - while walking the dog, i noticed a triangle of lights moving in thesky.  there were three steady lights with one flashing in the middle.  all werewhite.  it appeared to resemble the sighting in selden in june.  however itsmovement was not unusualit looked like unconventional aircraft lights.  the flight appeared to be overgreat south bay.  while i tried to follow it, it disappeared behind treetopsit was at a fairly low elevation.  when i last spotted it, it may have beenhoovering.  i dont think it was a helicopter - there was no noise.Balloon/blimp?
content.summary: Triangle lights.
Saw very bright light hovering and then moving

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i, along with her mother, brother, and sister-in-law were sitting onfront porch in rural setting, facing away from light sources.  i was first tonotice three red lights in a line in the sw sky, two on the left closertogether, moving right to left.  lights remained equidistant from one anotherwhile it moved, seeming to be on one craft.  object made no sound, appeared tobe within 1.5 miles on horizon.  lights came from behind tree line, disappearedbehind tree line.  never went above tree level.  planes and helicopters fly overmy house all the time (including after this) and their lights blinked, i couldhear their engines, and they were very, very high in sky, even when in the samedirection as this craft.
content.summary: Three solid red lights, low flying, no sound emitt

content.detailedDescription: we were on top of grady health system helipadawaiting for the aircraft to return so the lfight crew could leave.  we threesaw this sphere shaped object fly over the helipad and go towards the buildingsdowntown, no noise but slight tail.  a few minutes later, another object withred/white lights was observed sailing/flying along an edge of the helipad,descending towards the ground.  no noise or emissions noted and no evidence of acrash etc noted.  before observing these objects, we noticed in a building topfloor, a red and blue beacon flashing along with white strobes, this was neverobserved before this night.  we three concurred that we saw the same objects andobserved the same about the building.
content.summary: I saw a very light blue/green sphere travelling at

content.detailedDescription: i was sitting on my friends front steps onenight.He all of sudden said what the heck is that?.When i looked straight up isaw a circular disc with light in the middle and there was a ball of lightspinning inside of another light.About 1 minute later the objects lights shutoff and disappeared.
content.summary: I saw a ufo hovering about 500 ft above friends house.
Traingular shaped object over car followed home..L

content.detailedDescription: when first observed it was a very bright lighthovering in the sky.  it would then descend in a south to southwest direction athen take circular path and return to its original location.  at times it wouldflash lights in a circular pattern and it would fade and reappear over and overagain. we at times have seen more the one going at a rapid speed in the samedirection anfd then about 6 planes started following the ufos until theydissapeared into the sky.  many more things have been observed.
content.summary: Bright white light

content.detailedDescription: camped at the far end of first water canyon, ithought i saw lightening fash andlooked out of my tent. inoticed very brightlight above me and looked up.There was a huge black triangle in the sky at ninep.M. at night. after watching it for ten minutes,i grabed camera the craftimmediately faded up in the sky. still sitting on the ground with camera ready iwaited tentofifteen minutes for anything a large silver saucer appeared to hteright or west of where the first craft was sighted.Raising the camera i quicklysnapped a photoo alas it wouldd not be photogrhaped by me this night .Each timei camp in the superstitions, i always see at least one u.F.O. eacch night!  itis my belieaf that many other people see them there,they just dont report it!!!
content.summary: Sightings in superstition moountains .
1956 disk shaped craft sighted on lax landing approach.

content.detailedDescription: I was in bed, at the time this happened. ileft my security camera w/infrared light, recording in slp, at 2300 hrs.Thecamera is black26 white, capable to see in the dark, but is a street light in front of myhouse, the camera is pointed to the front lawn and driveway, where i keep mypick-up truck parked.Cheking the videotape next morning, i see this sphere,almost moving in front of the lens, then starting to move slowly around, landingin the grass, then going closer to my vehicle, and moving parallel to it fromback to front, then living in way up. this happened at 2346. at 0200 am,something different happened, this luminuos line, with three spheres or ayes,appeared in front of the camera, from botton up, and down and up, like ifscanning the lens! then it vanishes to the left.I have recordings of shortvisits of the spheres on the 6/29, 7/5, 7/12, 7/14.I have not see this spheresmyself, so i believe may be the infrared bean make them visible to the cameralens. (wich has a filter to make de infrared light visible)anbody else had sameexperience?
content.summary: Small luminous spheres, moving around my front yard.

content.detailedDescription: while camping in brown county forest my wife and iobserved a star like object that was not in the hieght of normal stars and notin the altitude of any aircraft.The star moved north to south at what appearedto be the speed of a slow moving propeller driven aircraft if it were at normalaltitude.This object was not an aircraft or a star.This object was not in ouratmosphere.This object was in outer orbit above any normal aircraft range(including milatry).My question if you can answer is, could this have been asatallite? (are they as bright as stars) or manmade craft? i.E,spaceshuttle,rocket,etc?I am very concerend about this and would like a reply(good or bad) as i know this was not like anything i or my wife have observed insky the past.Please respond.                                                     sincere,                                  william and allison warner
content.summary: Slowly (airplane speed) white star?
Saw object with 2 orange strobes
